mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_ALERT ( ID, ALERT_TYPE, ALERT_MESSAGE, ALERT_PARAM, RECEIVER_MEMBER_ID, SENDER_MEMBER_ID ) VALUES ( SEQ_ALERT.NEXTVAL, #{alertType}, #{alertMessage}, #{alertParam}, #{receiverMemberId}, #{senderMemberId} )
mapper.select:
SELECT TA.ID, TA.ALERT_TYPE, TA.ALERT_MESSAGE, TA.ALERT_CREATE_TIME, TA.ALERT_READ, TA.ALERT_PARAM, TA.RECEIVER_MEMBER_ID, TA.SENDER_MEMBER_ID, TM.MEMBER_NICKNAME, TM.MEMBER_IMG_NAME, TM.MEMBER_IMG_PATH FROM TBL_ALERT TA JOIN HR.TBL_MEMBER TM ON TM.ID = TA.SENDER_MEMBER_ID WHERE RECEIVER_MEMBER_ID = #{receiverMemberId}
AND ALERT_TYPE = #{alertType}
SELECT COUNT(ID) FROM TBL_ALERT WHERE RECEIVER_MEMBER_ID = #{receiverMemberId} AND ALERT_READ = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE TBL_ALERT SET ALERT_READ = 1 WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM TBL_ALERT WHERE RECEIVER_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId} OR SENDER_MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
